Plot:
The depiction of the life of Nobel Peace Prize winner and founder of Poland's Solidarity movement, Lech Walesa, as events in the 1970s lead to a peaceful revolution. The new film from polish master Andrzej Wajda.


Trivia:
Official submission of Poland to the Oscars 2014 best foreign language film category
